next_blood_donation_detail: Till your next Blood Donation. You can only donor after a minimum of 3 months from the last donor.
riwayat_donor_form_isi: Enter a record of your past donor activities.
6_digit_otp: Youâ€™ll receive 6 digit code to verify next.
daftar_popup: First please register before logging in
tidak_mendapat_kode: Did not you receive any code?
ubah_sandi_alert: Changing the password may affect other devices using the same account.
ubah_sandi_baru: The new password you entered is not same
isi_semua: Fill in all the available input
keluar_alert: Do you want to exit the application?
acara_donor_darah_isi: Donor blood for those in need
gagal_memuat: Failed to load, pull to reload
penjelasan_donor_des: Agree to the points below to continue registration.
penjelasan_donor_1: I have understand and read all the information and answered questions honestly.
penjelasan_donor_2: I understand and am willing to donate blood in a volume according to applicable standards and agree to have blood samples taken for the purposes of laboratory examinations in the form of blood group testing, HIV, hepatitis B, hepatitis C, syphilis and other infections that are needed by me, as well as for research purposes.
penjelasan_donor_3: If it turns out that the results of laboratory tests need to be followed up, then I agree to be given written information.
penjelasan_donor_4: If plasma components are not used for transfusion, I agree that they can be used as plasma products for treatment.
batalkan_pendaftaran_isi: Are you sure you want to cancel the registration from this donor event?
edit_profil_isi: Complete your identity for easy registration of donor events.
alamat_domisili: The current domicile address is the same as the address on the KTP (Identity Card)
qr_info: Your QR code is used for blood donation purposes at the donor location. The operator will scan your QR code to find out your blood type, donor history and other info.
pastikan_nik_ktp: Make sure your ID number is correct and please upload a photo of your ID card.
pastikan_nik: Make sure your NIK is correct.
foto_lagi_ktp: Please take another photo of your ID
afiliasi_isi: Join the PMI Organization around you to get convenience.
berhasil_daftar: Account created successfully, please login to continue.
ambil_gambar_desc: Position your identification card (KTP) in the frame and make sure it is perfectly visible.
hapus_afiliasi_desc: You will permanently delete PMI Membership
update_udd: Cannot change select PMI/UDD. please enter new PMI membership
ktp_tidak_terbaca_desc: Re-Take a photo of your ID card or fill in the identity manual
